title: Peter Mendelson released on bail after arrest; suspected of passing UK govt secrets to Epstein
summary_full: Former UK minister Peter Mandelson was arrested and released on bail in a misconduct probe concerning his ties to Jeffrey Epstein. Mandelson is suspected of improperly passing UK government information to Epstein in 2009, including details on raising funds and a tax on bankers' bonuses. This follows the release of millions of documents linked to Epstein.
